caption: b'What local shop always makes you feel at home for the holidays? Small businesses like @coffeeandcornbread, Unique Cleaners, and @breakwaterbookstore serve their communities with delicious treats, warm welcomes, thoughtful gifts and holiday joy all season long. #ShopSmall to share the joy and support the places you love.'

b'The days are getting shorter but it\xe2\x80\x99s always the right time for self-care, especially when it supports an incredible woman-owned business like @freedom.apothecary. #ShopSmall on their online store for nationwide shipping on wellness products to get you through the winter blues.'

b"Dewey Lucero\xe2\x80\x99s family has been growing and farming olives in Northern California for 4 generations, with olive trees over 100 years old. In 2015, Dewey discovered his passion for making olive oil and started @WildGroves. He has been producing unique and award-winning olive oil ever since, building a loyal customer base who feel connected to the product. 

\xe2\x80\x9cWe\xe2\x80\x99ve noticed a better connection with customers when it comes to being locally grown and family oriented. I think it has strengthened our customer retention substantially, as we have very loyal customers that always email me how much they like our products or even how they used it in their previous night\xe2\x80\x99s dinner...it's heartwarming to hear.\xe2\x80\x9d

We\xe2\x80\x99re proud to partner with @QuickBooks to back small businesses like Wild Groves all holiday season long. Learn more about how you can support small businesses in your community at ShopSmall.com. #ShopSmall #BackSmallBiz"

b'#SmallBizSat is almost here! Join host @ElaineWelteroth and get inspired to support Black-owned small businesses when you #ShopSmall this holiday season. Tune in to the latest episode of #AmexBuiltToLast where @IssaRae and @HannahDiop of @siennanaturals discuss how their small business champions Black beauty. Link in bio.'

b"Did you know that social media recommendations alone can be worth $197 billion for the U.S. small business economy? 

In celebration of #SmallBizSat on Nov 28, join us & @issarae and shout out your favorite small biz & why you love them with #ShopSmall on social media. We second Issa's shout out of @queen_losangeles! 
 
Learn more about the impact of social shoutouts on the small biz economy in Amex's latest study via the link in our bio."
b'Feel as good as you look when you shop for holiday outfits at small businesses you love. Tag an independent boutique that always has you dressed your best and #ShopSmall all season long.'

b"Tap to shop The SUPER Smart Hydrator and Resurfacing Compound from @ubeauty. Tina Craig, who founded the skincare brand in just 2019, says, \xe2\x80\x9cthere\xe2\x80\x99s always some positive that comes out of a seemingly impossibly difficult situation and for us, it\xe2\x80\x99s been the building of deeper connections with our community during quarantine.\xe2\x80\x9d\n\nPlease note, to make a purchase, you will be taken to the merchant's check-out experience. All purchases are made directly with the merchant and are subject to any applicable merchant and Instagram terms, conditions and policies. U.S. only."
b'Leave a lasting impression this holiday season with festive looks from your favorite small businesses and salons. Share joy when you #ShopSmall.'

b'100 grants to Black women entrepreneurs. 100 days of education and resources. 100% backing of American Express. We\xe2\x80\x99re proud to announce the #Amex100for100 program helping these founders of change jump start and grow their businesses. Learn more about the program in the link in bio. #AmexBusiness.'

b'Get deliciously drinkable gifts to sip on all season long from small businesses like @UrbanGrape, @findyourhilltop, and @paruteabar. Check out their online shops for nationwide shipping or #ShopSmall locally.'

b'In the latest episode of #AmexBuiltToLast, @ElaineWelteroth chats with Anifa Mvuemba, founder and fashion designer of @hanifaofficial, on the power of perseverance and defining your own success. Tune in now on Spotify, iTunes and YouTube. #ShopSmall'
b'In the great battle of pizza, when you #ShopSmall small businesses always come out on top. Tag your favorite independent pizza place and share joy all season long.'

b'Find gifts you can\xe2\x80\x99t wait to give\xe2\x80\x94and some you\xe2\x80\x99ll want to keep\xe2\x80\x94while supporting your favorite small businesses. #ShopSmall at the independent stores, boutiques, and salons you love to share joy all season long.'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re bringing you new at-home and outdoor dining experiences this winter, like The Yurt Villages in collaboration with @Resy that will be popping up outside 13 restaurants in cities across the U.S. Learn more about The Yurt Villages and the other unique dining experiences we\xe2\x80\x99re offering exclusively to Card Members by clicking on the link in our bio.'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re proud of our continued efforts to create an inclusive and diverse workplace. We\xe2\x80\x99re committing $1B  to advance our diversity, inclusion and equity priorities, including 100% pay equity and balanced representation across all levels of our company, increased spend with diverse suppliers, expanded access to capital for minority-owned businesses, and support to address systemic racism and advance equality in the communities where we live and work. Click on the link in our bio to read the full announcement.'

b'Don\xe2\x80\x99t miss #AmexBuiltToLast, the podcast where Black small business owners share why they started and won\xe2\x80\x99t stop. #ShopSmall'

b'Trick or Treating will look a bit different this year, but small businesses like @economycandy are going above and beyond to provide their customers with everything they need to get into the spooky spirit. That\xe2\x80\x99s where we got our treats this year. You still have time to #ShopSmall and fill your bucket with treats thanks to their contactless pickup and online order options.'

b'@samsmith has a special message just for our Card Members ahead of their live virtual performance of their new album \xe2\x80\x98Love Goes\xe2\x80\x99 at Abbey Road Studios on October 30 at 8pm EST / 3pm GMT.

ICYMI: Card Members can get their hands on exclusive #AmexUNSTAGED packages, which include behind the scenes content and a virtual meet and greet with Sam! As this is @samsmith\xe2\x80\x99s only performance this year, be sure to purchase now so you don\xe2\x80\x99t miss out!

For complete event info, click the link in bio.'

b'Come together tonight at 8pm ET for Forward Together, a virtual #AmexExperiences event filled with stories and songs to support @PublicTheaterNY! Click the link in bio to learn more about this free event open to all.'

b'Balancing mental and physical wellness can be challenging. Basketball legend @scottiepippen used meditation methods to get centered on his journey to becoming a champion. \n\nTake a moment to reset, too. Card Members can sign up for a complimentary year of @calm Premium Membership through 10/31. Terms apply. Click the link in bio to learn more.'

b"We've teamed up with @ainttooproudmusical to present a special free livestream tonight at 7pm ET! Join us for musical performances and a deeply personal conversation moderated by @whoopigoldberg, and featuring @thetemptations founder Otis Williams, Tony-nominated book writer @domorisseau, and cast members from Broadway\xe2\x80\x99s #AintTooProud. Click on the link in bio to learn more. #AmexExperiences"

b"As @samsmith rehearses for their live virtual performance of their new album \xe2\x80\x98Love Goes' at the legendary Abbey Road Studios, we\xe2\x80\x99re counting down the days until October 30th!

Don't miss this one-night-only live virtual performance on October 30th at 3pm EST / 8pm GMT! Tickets are also available for the replay on October 30th at 8pm EST.

For complete event, ticket and package information click the link in bio."

b'This #HispanicHeritageMonth, we\xe2\x80\x99re proud to back #TeamAmex colleagues like Bianca. Being the daughter of two Small Business owners has fueled Bianca\xe2\x80\x99s passion for helping small and diverse businesses thrive. She\xe2\x80\x99s led programs that award small business owners the support they need to grow and is an important member of our HOLA (Hispanic Origin and Latin American) colleague network.'

b'Don\xe2\x80\x99t forget to add your American Express Card to your @Resy profile to unlock exclusive access to virtual cooking demos with a lineup of award-winning chefs. Get all the details on these programs and more thru the link in our Bio. Terms apply. Who do you want to cook with?'

b'Today: He wrote the Quarantine Blues. Now @WyntonMarsalis shares how he\xe2\x80\x99s staying upbeat in what can be down times. Join us today (Wednesday, October 7th) at 4PM EST as the Jazz at Lincoln Center (@jazzdotorg) Managing & Artistic Director talks live with Susan Chapman-Hughes (@SusanChSpeaks), EVP/GM, Digital Capabilities & Ops at #AmexBusiness. Tune in on @americanexpressbusiness'

b'This #HispanicHeritageMonth we\xe2\x80\x99re proud to celebrate #TeamAmex colleagues like Pablo and so many others that are making a difference. \n\nPablo, who\xe2\x80\x99s originally from Venezuela and leads a 150-person team in Sunrise, FL, is helping build an inclusive and open culture. He\xe2\x80\x99s a leader within our HOLA (Hispanic Origin and Latin American) colleague network, which is one of our many colleague networks and an important way American Express is committed to fostering a diverse community.'

b'Meet the new #TheCenturionLounge at JFK\xe2\x80\x99s Terminal 4. Boasting a bold and eclectic design inspired by cultural landmarks of New York City, the lounge features bespoke workspaces, top-quality food and beverage and amenities such as a speakeasy bar and Equinox Body Lab. The new Centurion Lounge at JFK is set to open in the coming days. Click on the link in our bio to learn more.'

b'You\xe2\x80\x99re one referral away from earning more rewards. Refer a friend to apply before 10/28\xe2\x80\x94once they\xe2\x80\x99re approved, you\xe2\x80\x99ll earn more rewards on just about everything you buy during the next 3 months. From gifts to groceries, you can earn rewards on all of your eligible purchases. Terms & Eligibility Apply. Refer Now'

b'Join basketball legend, @ScottiePippen, and mindfulness expert @george.mumford for a live virtual experience celebrating the release of Scottie\xe2\x80\x99s new Sleep Story for @Calm, \xe2\x80\x9cThe History of a Dream.\xe2\x80\x9d Card Members visit the link in bio to get your tickets now and receive a signed photo of Scottie Pippen and George\xe2\x80\x99s book \xe2\x80\x9cThe Mindful Athlete\xe2\x80\x9d.'

b'At American Express, we believe the fundamental purpose of a corporation is to serve the needs of society and that backing our colleagues, customers and communities so they can thrive is critical to our success. Today, we\xe2\x80\x99re happy to share our first Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) Report, which includes details on how we are addressing some of the most pressing societal issues. To learn more about our efforts, visit the link in our bio.'

b"We've partnered with @Calm to bring you their newest Sleep Story, told by basketball legend @ScottiePippen, whose mindfulness practice helped him during his playing career.

ICYMI: Eligible Card Members get a complimentary year of @Calm Premium Membership, which includes access to their newest Sleep Story and so much more. Rest and relaxation await with the help of guided meditations and more great sleep stories. 

Terms apply. Click the link in bio to learn more and sign up."

b"Dreaming of travel? You aren't alone - 65% of consumers are dreaming about it, researching travel deals, or even starting to book their next trip. We\xe2\x80\x99re rolling out a number of new travel offers and resources. Click the link in our bio to learn more."

b'@Departuresmag Visionary Issue features these six standout individuals along with many others in the fields of activism, sustainability, technology and more. What story resonates with you? Click on the link in bio to read their stories.'

b'Card Members, your continuous support helps make a big difference to your community, small businesses, and the people who keep them running. Let\xe2\x80\x99s keep the #ShopSmall energy going not just today, but every day.'

b'Introducing, The Classics Remix: An exclusive takeout takeover featuring chefs we love x our cities\xe2\x80\x99 most iconic restaurants, available exclusively on @Resy. 

An an expansion of #TheClassics, @Resy\xe2\x80\x99s tribute to the restaurants that define our cities, #TheClassicsRemix celebrates these iconic restaurants in a nationwide takeout event series presented by #AmexGold. 

Tickets go on Sale 9/24 and early access for Amex Card Members starts today 9/22. Stay in the loop on this series by following @Resy and let us know which takeout takeover you\xe2\x80\x99re most excited for. 

Terms Apply. Visit Resy.com/classicsremix or click the link in bio for more!'
b'Thank you @aliciakeys and everyone who joined us for an epic #AmexUNSTAGED performance! We can\xe2\x80\x99t wait to connect again with you virtually.'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re excited to start reopening some of our Centurion Lounges. As we reopen, your health and safety remain our top priority. Click the link in our bio to learn more about #TheCenturionLounge Commitment.'

b'TONIGHT ONLY. Don\xe2\x80\x99t miss @aliciakeys\xe2\x80\x99 #AmexUNSTAGED performance. RSVP at AmexUNSTAGEDAlicia.com. Tune in at 6PM ET/3PM PT from anywhere in the world to be a part of this special moment.'

b"\xe2\x80\x9cNo one expects it to actually be me when I drop off the wine. So, I'll knock on their door and they open it. \xe2\x80\x98Oh, Hey, Mozel! what are you doing here? Aren't you supposed to be busy?\xe2\x80\x99 And I'm like, \xe2\x80\x98I'm dropping off wine.\xe2\x80\x99 And that\xe2\x80\x99s one of my favorite things to do. So, it's always a surprise when people see me, because they never expect me to be the one delivering it.\xe2\x80\x9d

Sommelier and wine store owner Mozel Watson brought wine delivery to his hometown of Harlem and considers providing wine and wine education to the community a \xe2\x80\x9cpromise\xe2\x80\x9d he intends to keep, no matter the circumstances.

Enrolled Card Members can get $5 back after they spend $10+ at an eligible small business, up to 10x. Spend by 9/20/2020. Enrollment closed on 8/23/20. Terms apply. Learn more at ShopSmall.com. Please drink responsibly."

b'\xe2\x80\x9cFood that is good for the community and good for our bodies\xe2\x80\x9d is what two friends with a passion for cooking set out to create with @AmaraKitchen.

To make their healthy cooking accessible to all in their #HighlandPark community, owner Paola Guasp started the Come Together program: \xe2\x80\x9cWe have some community bowls, which is pay what you can, so anybody can come in and enjoy the meals.\xe2\x80\x9d

Earlier this year, Amara Kitchen had to find a new way to serve up healthy food, so they quickly shifted to an online model and to-go orders. For Paola, it was a hustle to stay open: \xe2\x80\x9cI had 25 more gray hairs, but it feels worth it.\xe2\x80\x9d #AmexWelcomed

Enrolled Card Members can get $5 back after they spend $10+ at an eligible small business, up to 10x. Spend by 9/20/20. Enrollment closed on 8/23/20. Terms apply. Learn more at ShopSmall.com. #ShopSmall'

b'Everyone is invited to join us and @AliciaKeys for a special virtual performance to unveil her new album, ALICIA. \n\nPlus, Card Members can buy tickets to unlock special behind-the-scenes access with @AliciaKeys! Limited supply available. Please see AmexUNSTAGEDAlicia.com for details. #AmexUNSTAGED'

b'Today we\xe2\x80\x99re proud to launch the Coalition to Back Black Businesses with a $10 million commitment to fund a grant program and support U.S. Black-owned small businesses in their recovery and to help address the challenges they face due to racial and social inequalities. Applications are open now through September 21. Click on the link in our bio to learn more and apply. \nTag your favorite business to share the news.'

b'You\xe2\x80\x99re invited! See @aliciakeys\xe2\x80\x99 #AmexUNSTAGED performance, one night only on September 18. Limited supply available. Please see AmexUNSTAGEDAlicia.com for details.'

b"Bringing the physical to the virtual world is not new for AmEx. From concerts to cooking we're evolving how we bring our signature experiences to life for our Card Members. Discover more virtual experiences through our link in bio and tell us what type of events you\xe2\x80\x99d like to see in the comments."

b'Your #Vote Is Your Voice. This election year, American Express will be granting all U.S. colleagues up to three additional hours of paid time off to vote. Given the prospect of long lines, as polling places implement social distancing and other safety measures, we want to do our part to help ensure our colleagues have the time they need to exercise their critical right to vote.  Make a plan to vote this November 3rd. Learn more here: https://www.vote411.org/'

b'The next iteration of American Express UNSTAGED is back to give you access to an epic virtual performance from an award-winning artist. Join us on September 18! Artist reveal coming soon. Who will it be?'

b'As we collectively reflect on the events of 9/11, we want to take a moment to remember our 11 American Express colleagues and the many others lost. We honor their lives with the Eleven Tears memorial located in our NYC HQ lobby. #Remembering911'

b'Here\xe2\x80\x99s how you can amp up your favorite players by cheering them on from afar! Download the @USOpen app, tap the megaphone in the top left to open the Fan Cam, powered by Amex \xe2\x80\x93 we\xe2\x80\x99ll play our favorite cheers at the stadium. #USOpen'

b'@ShopTwigs always keeps Madison, WI looking good! Support the places that make our communities special and earn $5 when you spend $10+. Offer valid through 9/20/2020 with eligible small businesses. \n\nEligibility and terms apply. Learn more at ShopSmall.com.'

b"Coffee with a philosophy? That\xe2\x80\x99s what two entrepreneurs set out to create nearly thirteen years ago in #SantaCruz, CA, with @VerveCoffee.

Founders Colby Barr and Ryan O'Donovan are helping the coffee industry grow \xe2\x80\x9cin a way that is thoughtful and sustainable for future generations.\xe2\x80\x9d As a company, they take pride in connecting \xe2\x80\x9cthe best coffee producers with the most appreciative and excited customers.\xe2\x80\x9d

Recently, the team has been focused on getting back to work as they reconnect with their community, donate coffee to local heroes, and even meet some new masked faces. They\xe2\x80\x99re also glad to have their barista family back together: \xe2\x80\x9cYou may even see a social distance dance break inside the cafe from time to time.\xe2\x80\x9d #AmexWelcomed

Enrolled Card Members can get $5 back after they spend $10+ at an eligible small business, up to 10x. Spend by 9/20/20. Enrollment closed on 8/23/20. Terms apply. Learn more at ShopSmall.com. 

#ShopSmall spotlight in partnership with @Square."

b'In Bedford-Stuyvesant, #Brooklyn, Jamila McGill and Alfonso Wright have created what they consider \xe2\x80\x9ceveryone\xe2\x80\x99s favorite second home.\xe2\x80\x9d Their shop, @BrooklynTea, is a place for discovering the beauty of tea and its culture through the aroma and tastings.

The couple realized customers \xe2\x80\x9care connected to not just the loose leaf tea, but the folks behind it.\xe2\x80\x9d To bring tea to their customers, stay connected to their community, and bring new people into the family, the pair quickly shifted their focus to their online store.

This pivot brought strong support from their customers, allowing them to give back to community organizations and start an annual college scholarship fund.

As part of our mission to back small businesses and their communities, we\xe2\x80\x99re offering Card Members who enrolled by 8/23/2020, get $5 back after they spend $10+ directly with an eligible small business, up to 10x. Spend by 9/20/2020. Eligibility and terms apply. #ShopSmall'

Please note, to make a purchase, you will be taken to the merchant's check-out experience. All purchases are made directly with the merchant and are subject to any applicable merchant and Instagram terms, conditions and policies. U.S. only."

b'@Resy is paying homage to the neighborhoods, cuisines, cooks, and dishes that make communities vital with a new ongoing series. The series is kicking off by featuring Chinatowns. For nearly 200 years, Chinatowns have been a keystone of American cities. Follow @resy for more in this series and join them on a visit to #CHINATOWNUSA by clicking the link in our bio.'
b'Happy #NationalDogDay to all good dogs and their humans. Remember to #ShopSmall and support your local pet store when spoiling your fur baby. Find eligible local merchants at ShopSmall.com.'

b'Since leaving Syria as a refugee in 2011, Yassin Terou established @yassinfalafelhouse to build bridges with the community in Knoxville, Tennessee, because he \xe2\x80\x9cthought food would be a good way to connect, especially if you do it with high quality and lots of love.\xe2\x80\x9d

When Knoxville shut down earlier this year, Yassin set out to feed his community: \xe2\x80\x9cWe sent food for the elderly people and people in need, no charge,\xe2\x80\x9d he says. 

That was soon followed by feeding kids out of school, healthcare workers, and partnering with local charitable organizations. The community reciprocated by supporting the family-owned business, helping them grow and even make new hires. 

To help support amazing small businesses like @yassinfalafelhouse , we\xe2\x80\x99re offering enrolled Card Members $5 back after they spend $10+ directly with an eligible small business, up to 10x. Spend by 9/20/20. Eligibility and terms apply. #AmexWelcomed

#ShopSmall spotlight in partnership with @Square.'

b'At @heritagebicycle in #Chicago, owner Mike Salvatore is dedicated to making the best product for his customers, whether it be bikes or coffee. 

\xe2\x80\x9cWe rely on the kindness of our customers who are some of the best people in the neighborhood.\xe2\x80\x9d When the shop created Pay It Forward programs to support local healthcare and hospitality workers, the community stepped in to make purchases: \xe2\x80\x9cIt kept the lights on, it kept us going.\xe2\x80\x9d

We\xe2\x80\x99re offering $5 back after you spend $10+ directly with an eligible small business, up to 10x. Enrollment ends today at ShopSmall.com. Spend by 9/20/20. Eligibility and terms apply. #ShopSmall'

b"Unleash your inner baker and #ShopSmall in just a few taps to purchase this ROUND CAKE POP MOLD from @mylittlecakepopmolds ! b'Meet the duo serving fresh Hawaiian zest to the #Denver community out of a 1978 retro van: Will Cook and Alejandro Flores-Mu\xc3\xb1oz of @stokes_poke. 

Two years ago, the chef and activist pair took a chance on what is now a thriving small business. Despite recent challenges, Stokes Poke is getting back to business with a second location, a drive-thru kiosk that will help them continue to serve and feed the community.
